behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Oh, thou'rt unkindled, and a seeker of Lords.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: I am Ludleth of Courland.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
Look not in bewilderment as I say...
I linked the fire long ago, becoming a Lord of Cinder.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
If substantiation be thy want,
set thine eyes upon my charred corse.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
This sad cadav'r.
No need to be coy, have a closer look.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Fret not, fret not, my feet are here firmly planted.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: For I am a Lord, and this is my throne.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
subdialogue_text: Knowest thou of our purpose?

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
subdialogue_text:
Five thrones will take five Lords,
as kindling for the linking of the fire.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
subdialogue_text: The fast-fading flame must be linked, to preserve this world.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
subdialogue_text: A re-enactment of the first linking of the fire.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
subdialogue_text: So it is I became a Lord of Cinder.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
subdialogue_text: I may be but small, but I will die a colossus.

behavior: #0Talk-If he is sleeping
subdialogue_text: Ahh, beg pardon. I must have dozed a while.

behavior: #0Talk-If he is sleeping
subdialogue_text: Fret not, fret not, my feet are here firmly planted.

behavior: #0Talk-If he is sleeping
subdialogue_text: For I am a Lord, and this is my throne.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after entering the Undead Settlement
subdialogue_text: Listen, this might pique thine interest.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after entering the Undead Settlement
subdialogue_text: Before I was a Lord of Cinder, I was a student of transposition.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after entering the Undead Settlement
subdialogue_text: The process of extracting, and coalescing, the essence of a soul.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after entering the Undead Settlement
subdialogue_text: A forbidden art, that once left a foul stain upon Courland's honour.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after entering the Undead Settlement
subdialogue_text: Tis an art that grants powers once thought unattainable.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after entering the Undead Settlement
subdialogue_text:
Most transposing kilns were lost with Courland,
but this place is a crossing for all manner of cursed objects.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after entering the Undead Settlement
subdialogue_text: If thou happen'st 'pon a transposing kiln, bring it to me, quick.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after the protagonist defeats their 1st Lord of Cinder
subdialogue_text:
Ahh, most illustrious Lordseeker.
Or should I say, Lord-slayer?

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after the protagonist defeats their 1st Lord of Cinder
subdialogue_text:
Fine kindling for the thrones,
is it not, each soul truly worthy of Lordship.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after the protagonist defeats their 1st Lord of Cinder
subdialogue_text:
And all slain by thy hand.
To bind them to their thrones, even in death.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after the protagonist defeats their 1st Lord of Cinder
subdialogue_text:
Oh, I have no qualms.
For as we are to our thrones, thou art to thy duty.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after the protagonist defeats their 1st Lord of Cinder
subdialogue_text:
In fact, methinks thou'st helped
these poor Lords along their rightful path.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Transposing Kiln
subdialogue_text: Oh, belike it is...a transposing kiln in thy possession.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Transposing Kiln
subdialogue_text: Seen better days, but, methinks it shall suffice.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Transposing Kiln
subdialogue_text: Now, bring to me a twisted soul.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Transposing Kiln
subdialogue_text:
Transposition is the art of extracting,
and coalescing, the essence of a soul.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Transposing Kiln
subdialogue_text:
In transposing a twisted soul,
its true power transferreth to thee.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Transposing Kiln
subdialogue_text:
Thy purpose is to seek Lords, and slay them.
What's to fear in a little transposition, now?

behavior: #0Talk-After giving him the Transposing Kiln
subdialogue_text: Ah-hah, thou'rt returned. And a fine day it is.

behavior: #0Talk-After giving him the Transposing Kiln
subdialogue_text: So, happened upon any twisted souls?

behavior: #0Talk-After giving him the Transposing Kiln, if he is sleeping
subdialogue_text: Ahh, beg pardon. I must have dozed a while.

behavior: #0Talk-After giving him the Transposing Kiln, if he is sleeping
subdialogue_text: So, happened upon any twisted souls?

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" with "Lothric's Holy Sword" & "Lorian's Greatsword"
subdialogue_text: Ahh, thou'st two most peculiar swords discover'd.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" with "Lothric's Holy Sword" & "Lorian's Greatsword"
subdialogue_text: A curse once bound them together, such that they served as one.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" with "Lothric's Holy Sword" & "Lorian's Greatsword"
subdialogue_text: A transposing kiln should restore their rightful form.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" with "Lothric's Holy Sword" & "Lorian's Greatsword"
subdialogue_text: But before thou should'st act, think well upon the matter.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" with "Lothric's Holy Sword" & "Lorian's Greatsword"
subdialogue_text: As thou knowest, they are but newly rent apart.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave
subdialogue_text: Now, now, do not be away overlong.

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: Ahh, found her, did we?

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: And the black eyes that shimmer within, I see?

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: Tis as if it were but yesterday.

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: We did all we could to spare her from them.

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: Much has happened since.

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: Mayhap I should apprise thee...

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text:
Of what the thin light of these eyes might reveal,
to the eyeless Fire Keeper.

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text:
Scenes of betrayal,
things never intended for her ken, visions of...

behavior: #0Talk-After acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: ...this age's end...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text:
The eyes shew a world destitute of fire,
a barren plane of endless darkness.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: A place born of betrayal.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text:
So I will'd myself Lord, to link the fire,
to paint a new vision.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after acquiring the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: What is thine intent?

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after giving the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text:
I took the mantle of Lord of Cinder of mine own volition.
I speak these words with pride.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after giving the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: Choose thy fate alone. Seize it with thine own hands.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after giving the Eyes of a Fire Keeper
subdialogue_text: All the more, should thy fate entail such foul betrayal...

behavior: #0Talk-After helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: Ahh, well met. Thou'rt at last returned.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: Knowest thou the name, Anri of Astora?

behavior: #0Talk-After helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: The brave girl left this, as thanks.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: The brave lad left this, as thanks.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: Though gave no elucidation...

behavior: #0Talk-After helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: So. Happened upon any twisted souls?

behavior: #00Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: Now, heed this little warning, from this little lord.

behavior: #00Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: Seek not the girl.

behavior: #00Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: Seek not the boy.

behavior: #00Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text:
She knoweth her fate.
What will become of her upon her duty's end.

behavior: #00Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text:
He knoweth his fate.
What will become of him upon his duty's end.

behavior: #00Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: She would not wish thee follow her.

behavior: #00Menu-Choose "Leave", or abruptly leave after helping Anri defeat Aldrich
subdialogue_text: He would not wish thee follow him.

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord
subdialogue_text: Ahh, well met. All is as planned, is it not?

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord
subdialogue_text: Five lords for five thrones...

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord
subdialogue_text: Glory be, my Lord-slaying Champion. It is all thy doing.

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord
subdialogue_text: The stage is set for me to play my part as Lord, too.

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord
subdialogue_text: Go. Speak with the Fire Keeper.

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord, after "Wish for a world without flame"
subdialogue_text: Ahh, well met. All is as planned, is it not?

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord, after "Wish for a world without flame"
subdialogue_text: Five lords for five thrones...

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord, after "Wish for a world without flame"
subdialogue_text: To think others might ne'er be raised...

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord, after "Wish for a world without flame"
subdialogue_text:
And I, of the Last Lords, a rather little lord,
most undeserving of the honour.

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord, after "Wish for a world without flame"
subdialogue_text: Speak with the Fire Keeper.

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord, after "Wish for a world without flame"
subdialogue_text: Treat the Fire Keeper not with discourtesy.

behavior: #0After offering all Cinders of a Lord, after "Wish for a world without flame"
subdialogue_text: She is much like thee. Prisoners, both, kept to link the fire.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-1st time
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
#0Upon dying
#0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-1st time
subdialogue_text: Ahh, it singeth, to the bone, it hurts...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-1st time
subdialogue_text: Please, help me. Be done with me...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-1st time
subdialogue_text: No, gods, no, I cannot bear it...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-1st time
subdialogue_text: It burns, burns, help me...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
subdialogue_text: See ye not? I am a Lord...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
subdialogue_text: A wee flame, belike, but I shoulder the world...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Forgive me. Oh, please...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
subdialogue_text: I am not to blame, I'm not...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
subdialogue_text: ##...She hath waited a long time indeed...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
subdialogue_text: ##Lord-slayer, do not fail us now...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
subdialogue_text: ##Five Lords, for five thrones...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
subdialogue_text: ##Well well, what peculiar things thou keep'st on thy person...

behavior: #0After approaching him once he has revived from being killed-2nd time
